thankYouText: Thanks, we'll be in touch shortly!
meetingsText:
IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN WORKING WITH BR&NEWWEDDINGS FREYA IS MORE THAN HAPPY TO TRAVEL TO YOU, OR YOU CAN COME TO US HERE IN CHILTON TO CHAT THROUGH YOUR IDEAS. 

WE ARE ONLY 45 MINUTES FROM CENTRAL LONDON BY TRAIN, OUR NEAREST STATION IS DIDCOT PARKWAY, OR IF YOU WISH TO DRIVE WE ARE 10 MINUTES FROM JUNCTION 13 OF THE M4.

AN INITIAL MEETING IS INCLUDED IN THE COST OF YOUR PROPOSAL* (*EITHER IN LONDON OR WITHIN 1 HOURS DRIVE OF THE STUDIO OX11 0PW)

MEETINGS ARE BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.
